medical_history.chief_complaint: Progressive trismus, difficulty in eating, burning sensation when consuming spicy foods, and limited mouth opening.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began progressively worsening over the last two years, with recent severity leading to only liquid food passing with relative ease. Change in voice and restricted tongue movement noted in the past three months.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Chewing betel nuts for over 15 years. Denied any other significant medical or family issues.
